body: this is korean products um HAHA
And here I thought it was a nice clean manga when I saw it on mangahere
Something wrong with the last chapter, cant seem to scroll through it
Not 25 chaps, I was looking forward to it too...

Long stories like this are nice, the progress is more slow and the don't jump straight to sex like happens in the normal shorter ones. That way I get more in the story, and the arousal goes slow and steady. Shorter ones are also good, with that immediate feeling of "I WANT TO FUCK", but having some slow build up until the sex scene feels really nice.
